From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Eugene Tipen [mailto:etipenko@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, April 06, 2012 8:32 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Thanks a lot Sara,
I appreciate all of the information you've provided. Let me review it and I will be back asap.
Sincerely Eugene Tipenko 6143735553On Thu, Apr 5, 2012 at 5:29 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Dear Eugne , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
